soulWeapon.advancement0: Summons the soul of Nightmare Fang, Kitrax for 10 sec. For every 1 stack of Soul owned, takes 6% reduced DMG, recovering HP euqal to 1% of own Max HP and 50 Mana every sec. Afterward, deals ??? M.DMG to enemies in a wide frontal range and petrifies the hit targets for 4 sec. If Viska has 5 Souls, Skill Cooldown will reset.

soulWeapon.advancement2: For the Duration of Skill, DMG of 'I'll rip you to pieces!!' increases by 100%.

profile.likes: Fighting powerful demons and devouring them afterward

background.story: A maverick among Demons who seeks to grow her own power by devouring other powerful Demons. She embodies the worst possible meaning of the word Demon. She crossed the dimensional rift to seek out and devour the Demons who traveled to the earthly realm. She placed a limit on her own power and assumed the form of a sickly young girl to further humiliate her victims. She detests weaklings who pretend to be strong. On the other hand, she respects those who recognize their own weaknesses and risk their lives in the pursuit of strength.

itemIntroductions.weapon: Nightmare Kitrax was known as the best, and the most terrifying, of the succubi. After devouring Kitrax whole, soul and all, Viska came up with her most powerful weapon yet. This spike is the physical manifestation of fear and despair. Death is the only fate of its unfortunate victims. It constantly injects fear into its victim's soul, reducing even the most formidable enemy to mere prey.
itemIntroductions.soul:
Kitrax, the queen of nightmare, was an evil being who phased between the reality and dreams, and feasted upon fear.
Even among the Demons, there were many who feared her and refused to confront her. Viska however, was different. To her, fear was something to conquer, not to be afraid of.
That is why Viska challenged Kitrax face to face, crushed her fear, and annexed her strength.

After this day, Viska became a subject of fear among the Demons.
She abused her newly-acquired power and became someone even more vicious than Kitrax. Over time, the number of Demons who would face Viska in the Pandemonium surely diminished.

But Viska did not care.
To her, it was one of the means to find those strong enough to confront her.
Viska wished to fight an opponent who can overcome even the fear of Kitrax, not the worthless ones who cannot even overcome that nightmare.

Viska continued to feast the Demons who challenged her, and it is told that she surpassed the limit after accumulating enough strength, and gradually turned into a great demon deserving of a title: Dark Lord.
treasures: Jewels that Viska used to store the memory of demons that she thought were yummy. She always felt that their flavors faded away too quickly. When she couldn't find anything nice to eat around her, she came up with a brilliant idea. She thought that taking the dreams out of the Nightmare Jewels that Nightmare Kitrax had and storing her memory of eating delicious prey would allow her to relive those past pleasures. Excited, she imbued the jewel with the memory of eating a delicious demon, and ever since, Viska has been seeking for better-tasting things to put in the jewels.

Claw of the violent magic beast Urgol, who is said to bite off souls. The day Viska decided to hunt in the Material World, she devoured Urgol from the Demon World. Combined with the ability that Viska has to absorb the power of others, it displayed great power, and it is essential to eat Demons who trespassed to the Material World.

Crystallized form of great demon Curapis's soul, who has the power to get big. He was one of the first demons that Viska hunted in the Demon World, and it is said that it used its big body to dominate his enemies. But battle isn't all about strength, but using one's brain as well. The giant demon was defeated and eaten by a predator who used her brain. The power to get big became Viska's, and she can use it freely now.

Crystallized Mana energy of 'Araneck,' a beast that swallowed 'Gluttony' and one of the beasts of 7 sins killed by Viska after she came over to the material world. The crystal has the ability to visualize the force of its owner with a color through the jewel in the center. It was transparent at first, but when Viska touched it, it let out a radiant red light, with a small pattern appearing on the surface. The pattern has grown bigger as Viska's powers grew, and she would sometimes think of what the pattern would look like when she becomes the Dark Lord.
